div.h3: 2012-08-26: I2P dev build 0.9.1-18 for public beta test
div.p:
After some profile of the I2P code is underway, lots of changes to I2P was implemented into the I2P 0.9.2 dev cycle. Also DHT mode was added to I2Psnark. If you want to test the latest enhancements and get the advantages of DHT in I2P, grab your update and install it! Disclaimer: this is still a development version and may contain bugs, though it does run fine on our routers.
The 0.9.1-18 i2pupdate200.zip update file is available from echelon.i2p and update.killyourtv.i2p. Those that use the Debian/Ubuntu package can help test the dev build by downloading the Debian package and following the instructions here.
0.9.1 includes a large number of bug fixes and improvements in i2psnark, streaming, and elsewhere. There are also home page changes, new themes, and translation updates. Upgrading is recommended.

Say hello to the volunteers on the #i2p-help IRC channel. Get involved, spread the word, and donate! If you find a bug, please enter a report on trac. To help on translations, volunteer on IRC #i2p-dev or sign up on Transifex.
